content.raw:
another known issue is that step teleop through `keyboard_teleop` does not seem to work right now, but manually publishing works fine

~~~
rostopic pub -1 /atlas/atlas_sim_interface_command atlas_msgs/AtlasSimInterfaceCommand '{ behavior: 5, step_params: { desired_step: { step_index: 1, foot_index: 0, duration: 0.0, pose: { position: { x: 0.2, y: 0.1, z: 0 }, orientation: { x: 0, y: 0, z: 0, w: 1 } }, swing_height: 0 }, use_demo_walk: false  } }'
~~~
content.html:
another known issue is that step teleop through keyboard_teleop does not seem to work right now, but manually publishing works fine

rostopic pub -1 /atlas/atlas_sim_interface_command atlas_msgs/AtlasSimInterfaceCommand '{ behavior: 5, step_params: { desired_step: { step_index: 1, foot_index: 0, duration: 0.0, pose: { position: { x: 0.2, y: 0.1, z: 0 }, orientation: { x: 0, y: 0, z: 0, w: 1 } }, swing_height: 0 }, use_demo_walk: false  } }'
